snippet: Major universities are joining Stanford, Princeton and others to expand Coursera, a venture that offers free massive open online courses, or MOCCs.
abstract: Major universities are joining Stanford, Princeton and others to expand Coursera, a venture that offers free massive open online courses, or MOOCs; schools will partner with company to offer 100 or more classes in fall 2012 that are expected to draw millions of students and adult learners globally.
lead_paragraph: Major universities are joining Stanford, Princeton and others to expand Coursera, a venture that offers free massive open online courses, or MOCCs.

headline.seo: Consortium of Colleges Takes Online Education to New Level
headline.main: Universities Reshaping Education on the Web
headline.print_headline: Universities Reshaping Education On the Web
